field.label: Description
field.helptext: Describe this permission set's purpose for at-a-glance assignment.
Checks if the search on UsersToAdd has input

action.label: if this perm set has users associated with it

skuid__text.contents:
You must remove this permission set from the {{$Model.UserPermSets.data.length}} users it is assigned to before deleting it.

You can do this within the Users tab of this permission set's detail screen.
This permission set name is already in use.
Associated data sources
You haven't added data sources to this app

<div style="text-align: center;"><!--(figmeta)eyJmaWxlS2V5IjoiamNiR1RTejJLTms0ZnFva0Nmb2k3UCIsInBhc3RlSUQiOi0xLCJkYXRhVHlwZSI6InNjZW5lIn0K(/figmeta)--><!--(figma)(/figma)-->Data sources are how Skuid accesses external data. You can't configure permissions for them or use them within your app’s pages before adding them to the app.<br /> <br /> If you need data sources, add them via this app's<br /> <strong>Data</strong> tab. You can then configure data source access<br /> on this permission set later.</div>
don't delete this wrapper
{{user.first_name}} {{user.last_name}}
Federation Id
{{user.name}} may lose access to pages, data sources, and other resources once this permission set is removed.
If this is the only permission set granting a user app access, they will be removed from the app.
You haven't assigned this permission set to any users
The permissions granted by this permission set will not apply to users until it's been assigned to them.
Enable access to this data source to configure object permissions below.
You haven't imported any objects into this data source

To import objects, navigate to this data source's detail screen in the site Data Sources page.
 
After importing objects, return to this permission set to configure the necessary permissions.
Data source objects
